Table of Contents

Namespace osu.Framework.Localisation

Classes

CaseTransformableString

A string which can apply case transformations to underlying localisable string.

CultureInfoHelper
LocaleMapping

Maps a localisation store to a lookup string. Used by LocalisationManager.

LocalisableDescriptionAttribute

Specifies a LocalisableString-based description for the target element. The description can be retrieved through GetLocalisableDescription<T>(T).

LocalisableFormattableString

A localisable string with formatting support.

LocalisableStringEqualityComparer

An equality comparer for the LocalisableString type.

LocalisationManager
LocalisationParameters

A set of parameters that control the way strings are localised.

RomanisableString

A string that has a romanised fallback to allow a better experience for users that potentially can't read the original script. See ShowUnicode, which can toggle the display of romanised variants.

TranslatableString

A string which can be translated using a key lookup.

Structs

LocalisableString

A descriptor representing text that can be localised and formatted.

Interfaces

ILocalisableStringData

An interface for LocalisableString's data.

ILocalisationStore
ILocalisedBindableString

An IBindable<T> which has its value set depending on the current locale of the LocalisationManager.

Enums

Casing

Case applicable to the underlying localisable string of a CaseTransformableString.
